website_summaries.verdict: If a tight, elastic fit is not negotiable for you, look no further. These playard sheets are fitted with elastic not only at the corners, but around the entire edge.
pros: Hypoallergenic and pre-washed, making it ideal for babies with sensitive skin
Features elastic band around the entire edge
cons: A bit snug on some playard mattresses, but this helps to keep the sheet in place

website_summaries.verdict: These sheets are so cute, you'll wish they fit the regular crib.
pros: Soft sheets with a cute design
cons: May have a slight odor when they arrive, but it dissipates with time and washing

customer_reviews.title: Depth!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft fabric. My only complaint was that the description should have stated that these are for 5 inch thick mattresses only. They will not fit on my pack and play mattress, (Graco) which is only 1 1/2 inch thick. Better description needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Schill

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. After the first wash, before even using them there is a pea sized hole in the corner of one of the sheets. I've contacted the seller and there has been no response back. Yes they're soft but worthless if they can't hold up through the washing machine. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use these on a Graco Pack N Play. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a Graco Pack N Play. They are so tight that they have warped and bent the "mattress" that comes with the Pack N Play.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly295

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. We are the grandparents and we host our grandson overnight about once a month, plus he is at our house every week. He outgrew the smaller bed we had for him, so I got these sheets for the pack and play. They fit perfectly and are so cute! They are nice and soft and wash up perfectly. Big recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift, Perfect Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece who is the proud Mom of a baby girl, after 2 boys. She was gifted a pack and play but didn’t have the sheets. When she told me the colors of the pack and play these sheets seemed to be the absolute perfect color. I ordered them the day after my great niece was born and they were guaranteed delivery when they arrived home. They arrived and are perfect. Couldn’t be more perfect in color, fit and touch.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets, but run a little small
customer_reviews.text: These fitted sheets are snug on my 4moms Breeze Pack'n Play. The bottom pad of the Pack'n Play folds up like an accordion for traveling. When these fitted sheets go on, the pad tends to fold up on its own because they're so snug. However, once the bottom pad is velcro-attached to the Pack'n Play, they are fine. I like this brand enough that I've purchased two sets of these fitted sheets from them.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: High quality soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these sheets! They fit the portable crib mattress at my son's daycare great (24x38x3). I had ordered a sheet from a different retailer previously that had shrunk after washing and was too small. This one didn't shrunk and is high quality, soft jersey, not thin. The elastic is seen in nicely as well and looks like it will stand up to lots of use. Not to mention the cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: Hitchenzie

customer_reviews.title: and it is rough and not great material for a baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my graco pack n play and they fit perfectly. I have a graco brand sheet, and it is rough and not great material for a baby. These are jersey type material and got more soft every time I washed them. I will probably buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the sheet doesn’t cover the velcro.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets were really soft out of the package but after washing them they stiffened up a bit. I’m hoping they’ll get softer with continued washing. While they fit the pack n play mattress, these sheets can easily cover the velcro that holds the mattress in place and because the elastic goes all the way around the sheet, if the velcro isn’t stuck, the elastic can kind of pull the mattress up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Olson

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: These shrunk a bit even with gentle cold wash, dreft and low dryer heat. Very tight on pack & play mattress pad. So much so that it buckles the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Prebeg

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 24x38x3, received 24x38x6; description was 24x38x3
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very soft, however, the size is important. The description on Amazon indicated the sheets were 24x38x3; however, when the box got here, the size was 24x38x6, which in a pack n play makes them a little too loose. My daughter ordered the same sheets and received the correct size. If not for that, my review would be 5 stars. The 3” would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the designs of these. They are very soft and my son seems to sleep on them well when he is using a pack and play for sleep.
customer_reviews.author: michael hulme

customer_reviews.title: not used yet
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate an item that hasn't been used yet. They appear well-made and definitely soft and nice looking. I imagine they will be comfortable, but it will be hard to get an opinion from my baby grandson, as he won't be talking for at least 18 months (or more).
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dare

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and well made. Perfect fit for both the pack and play mattress that was purchased separately and for the base that came with the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on durability. I bought these sheets for my granddaughters pack and play. They seem really nice, soft, fit well. I’ve washed them once. Came out nice. These sheets only get occasional use, but the quality is very nice. I don’t foresee a problem with them.

customer_reviews.title: The Cuddly Cubs sheets arrived on schedule. They fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The Cuddly Cubs sheets arrived on schedule. They fit the pack 'n play cribs perfectly and were very soft. The babies didn't really want to sleep but it was due to Christmas excitement and not the comfort of the sheets. Thanks!

What a nice personal touch! Something you do not see anymore. Thank you Farah!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Playard Sheets!

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these sheets as a replacement for the ones we were using and was delighted with the quality
customer_reviews.text: We have six Grandbabies under the age of three and have a pack and play that gets used almost daily:). I ordered these sheets as a replacement for the ones we were using and was delighted with the quality. They are well made and so soft for our little ones to lay on. They were shipped and received as promised and far exceed the quality of the ones we were using. We are into soft and cuddly at Grammy's house and these sheets exceeded my expectations!

I've washed them and folded them and they are waiting in the closet for the first opportunity that will present itself. They feel soft and lovely and the pattern is pretty and appealing so I am sure my babies will sleep so soundly on them. Thank you! Leah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sheets and so soft
customer_reviews.text: Adorable sheets and so soft! They fit perfectly snug with plenty of room. We added a 2" memory foam mat to his PNP and the sheets still easily fit. We may be adding pool noodles under sheets to help him transition from bassinet to laying flat, and I have no concerns about them fitting over that too. Sweet family owned company. Will be purchasing again from them.

product_meta.title: Cuddly Cubs Fitted Pack and Play Playard Sheets Compatible With Graco Pack n Play, 4Moms, Chicco, Guava Lotus and Other Playpen, Play Yards, Portable and Mini Cribs
product_meta.description:
Your little darling will have the most fun time or a restful, good night sleep without any irritations or interruptions!

Comfort and security comes first. Our sheets for pack n play are very stretchy and fit both 27" x 39" play yard mattress and 24" x 38" mini crib mattress like a charm. It's 150 gsm thick fabric and breathable to be perfect sheet for your baby's sensitive skin. Our pack play sheets are better than graco pack and play sheets because they are knitted and more softer, just like your favorite T shirt and they give your baby the most needed comfort. Our pack in play sheets are stretchy and easily replace any mini crib sheets 24 x 38 x 3 for a more snug fit because of its deep pockets. Fits well on Grayco, Dream on Me, LA Baby mats.

Are you ready to make the best choice for yourself as much as you do for your baby, and make your life simple?

Most mini fitted crib sheets do not consider your needs as a parent. It's a pain when you buy a beautiful print and it fades after couple of washes and fabric starts pilling or worst the sheets shrink to not even fit anymore. But with our baby mini crib sheet, you don't have to worry about any of these problems, because we take pride in our manufacturing process and make sure they just don't happen. Moreover, its machine washable with clear instructions and a two pack gives you a peace of mind because you can always use the other one!

Our cute and sturdy box packaging makes this mini crib bedding set an ideal gift for baby shower or any other occasion.
